title: Walnut pumpkin tart
ingredients: ['1 recipe pastry for a 23cm tart', '500g pumpkin, cooked and pureed', '1 (397g) tin condensed sweetened milk', '1 egg', '1 1/4 teaspoons ground cinnamon, divided', '1/2 teaspoon ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon salt', 'Walnut topping', '4 tablespoons dark brown soft sugar', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '25g butter', '100g chopped walnuts']
